Request an Invite

Legacy Edition Minigames is currently in a closed alpha.

You will run into bugs and issues, please understand that the experience will not be completely polished.

The time it takes to have your request reviewed is inconsistent, it takes on average a little over a week to be reviewed.

If you would like to skip the line, you may join our patreon (starting at $2)

Note: Actions you have taken before the closed alpha will impact if you are accepted and can impact the time it takes to be reviewed. If you are banned, you will need to appeal that ban first.
